text:
hey guys,
it seems that it's no longer possible to clone a theme downloaded/purchased from the marketplace but only create a child theme; while for HubSpot themes it's still possible to perform both operations: clone and/or copy the theme
Is this correct or a bug? Just not to give wrong information to customers. Thanks

It's been like that for a while. There is still a way to clone a theme. Open the marketplace theme, open any template of that theme and there you'll see a “Clone Theme” button. You can use that for now. :spock-hand:

Hi Pawan,
Yes I have noticed that opening any template gives me this option but so it is more complicated for an "inexperienced" user
Yes. At first, it made no sense disabling the cloning option from outside but then it's available at the template level!
Could you please help us with this <@UEKMY50SU>?
